0.0: When the equipping character is healed or uses a heal, they will gain a Stoic's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and grant the Roused effect for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain <cryo>40</cryo> Elemental Mastery, and 2s after the effect occurs, each Symbol consumed will restore <cryo>2</cryo> Energy to said character. 1 Roused effect can occur every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the equipping character is off-field.
